Welcome to CHI St. Vincent

Welcome to CHI St. Vincent, a proud member of CommonSpirit Health. Since 1888, we have been a trusted leader in health care, serving central and southwest Arkansas while pioneering numerous medical advancements.

Jump to
  • About CHI St. Vincent
  • How can we help you
  • Our services
  • St. Vincent locations
  • Our leadership
  • More about St. Vincent

About us

Headquartered in Little Rock, CHI St. Vincent provides comprehensive care through a network of hospitals, clinics, and specialty services. Our hospitals in Little Rock, Sherwood, Morrilton and Hot Springs, along with a growing 37-acre ambulatory campus in west Little Rock, ensure access to high-quality care. With 80 primary care and specialty clinics, over 300 affiliated physicians, the state’s largest team of cardiologists and 4,300 dedicated employees, we are committed to serving our communities with excellence and compassion.

More about CHI St. Vincent

Let's find a doctor

Search insurances
When using Find a Doctor, employed providers and those within our joint ventured medical groups will be displayed first, followed by providers in our Clinically Integrated Network (CIN)
A Clinically Integrated Network brings together integrated health systems (hospitals and clinics) and community-based independent healthcare providers for the purpose of effectively coordinating and managing the delivery of healthcare to patients. Through the delivery of care within a high performing network, a Clinically Integrated Network's goals are to provide patients with greater access to care, deliver high quality medical services and improved outcomes, while making healthcare more affordable.
and ACOs, and independent providers who practice at a CommonSpirit Health-affiliated facility.

Our services and specialties

Heart Care

Specializing in comprehensive and advanced heart care treatments to help keep your heart strong.

Explore more

Neurosurgery

Top-rated neurosurgeons working together with neurologists to find the most effective treatment for you.

Learn more

General Surgery

Exceptional surgical expertise spanning a wide range of conditions, from routine to complex, across multiple specialties.

Get details

Cancer Care

Offering a holistic approach to cancer care by using advanced treatments and discoveries through cancer research.

Discover more

Orthopedic Care

Orthopedic care and alternative treatment options such as minimally invasive surgery to help keep you strong and active.

Explore care options

Bariatric Surgery

Offering start-to-finish support and personalized bariatric surgery programs for significant, lasting weight loss results.

Get started
